mapper.insert: insert into gallery_imageB ( image_id, file_name, server_file_name, source, gallery_id) values( gallery_imageB_seq.nextval, #{fileName}, #{serverFileName}, #{source}, #{galleryId})
mapper.update: update galleryB set title=#{title}, country=#{country}, description=#{description}, update_date = sysdate where gallery_id=#{galleryId}
mapper.select: select g.gallery_id, g.title, g.password, g.country, g.owner, g.description, g.read_cnt, g.reg_date, g.update_date, i.image_id, i.file_name, i.server_file_name, i.source, i.reg_date image_reg_date, i.update_date image_update_date from ( select * from ( select row_number() over(order by gallery_id) as seq, gallery_id, title, password, country, owner, description, read_cnt, reg_date, update_date from galleryb ) where seq between #{start} and #{end} ) g, gallery_imageB i where g.gallery_id = i.gallery_id(+) order by ${orderBy} desc

select g.gallery_id, g.title, g.password, g.country, g.owner, g.description, g.read_cnt, g.reg_date, g.update_date, i.image_id, i.file_name, i.server_file_name, i.source, i.reg_date image_reg_date, i.update_date image_update_date from ( select * from ( select row_number() over(order by gallery_id) as seq, gallery_id, title, password, country, owner, description, read_cnt, reg_date, update_date from galleryb ) where ${category} like #{keyword} ) g, gallery_imageB i where g.gallery_id = i.gallery_id(+) order by gallery_id desc
